sentences.sContent: The creators of the original X-Men abbreviated the title of its sequel to simply X2.
sentences.sCn: 第1部《X战警》的创作者们把其续集的片名缩写成简单的《X2》。

remMethod.val: ab(加强) + brev(短) + iate → 缩短

words.tran: 简短的；小型的；服装超短的

trans.tranOther: to make a word or expression shorter by not including letters or using only the first letter of each word
